website_summaries.verdict: Brightens and illuminates while reducing wrinkles.
pros: Uses antioxidants in formula for natural anti-aging protection and improvement
cons: Customers said they couldn't layer it underneath lotion or foundation

customer_reviews.title: Weightless and gets rid of the deeper lines
customer_reviews.text: I notice a difference when I run out of this. It seems to evaporate very quickly, so best to cap the top and use the dropper. It has gotten rid of the deeper more obvious lines and made the smaller lines less visible. They are not gone completely, unfortunately. But much better than most products.
customer_reviews.author: Wise Woman

customer_reviews.title: Love it! This is my 3rd order from Amazon ...
customer_reviews.text: Superb product. Love it! This is my 3rd order from Amazon and will continue using it as long as they sell it.
customer_reviews.author: PinkyXL7

customer_reviews.title: Still trying to decide if I love it
customer_reviews.text: Been using for a week now & I while it feels nice, I haven't seen a significant improvement. I'll keep using, but not re-order if I don't notice a difference
customer_reviews.author: bel1224

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, easy to use and feels nice! Very compact too for travel!

customer_reviews.title: waste of money

customer_reviews.author: Mary Z

customer_reviews.title: Like a miracle
customer_reviews.text: It worked even in the second week! Like a miracle. I am a person who always has black circles which I was thinking a kind of genetic, however since I started using right eye treatments I recognised that my circles was coused by being careless and this serum gave me a lighter and healtier rye rounds!

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome!

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived on time, condition as described in original ...

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this twice a day and love it. I love Perricone products and they are worth the price. Will purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Like it

customer_reviews.title: Found it to be extremely oily and caused red blotches ...
customer_reviews.text: Found it to be extremely oily and caused red blotches around my eyes. I had to return for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Is this water?
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty much an odorless, thin liquid in a medicine dropper bottle. I cant even tell if its anything more than water, although its not stopping me from using under my eyes and patting on my face every night under my usual skincare products. Very thin, non-greasy and absorbs very quickly. Definitely do not see a difference or feel like its doing anything, Disappointed - usually impressed by Perricone's other products. Definitely will not reorder. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: JBern

customer_reviews.title: Easy to absorb for eye
customer_reviews.text: This eye serum is easy to absorb and no smell. I like it. It is perfect for basic skin care.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is miraculous! Reduced inflammation and bruising within hours of application!
customer_reviews.author: sally rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: clogs pores
customer_reviews.text: I find that this product to be used under the eyes, clogs my skin just under the eye orbit. I have been using it for about one month and would not purchase it again. I prefer Neocutis or Skinmedica products for results.
customer_reviews.author: toni Orleck lubka

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Serum
customer_reviews.text: Although it's eye serum, but I always use it on my whole face. When using twice a day, it can still last around 2 months. You can see you skin become much brighter and clearer after 1~2 weeks. It absorbs very fast, won't feel oily at all. This one feels the same as the bottle I ordered from the official website, should be authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: unsure
customer_reviews.text: First bottle was gel, which is not right. Had to return it and reorder. I am not sure if it was a seller issue or product issue.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for quite some time now and I love the results. I think it does slow the wrinkling process...

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: It almost destroyed my face. I used it for 3 straight days and I woke up with horribly swollen eyes. They were swollen, wrinkled and extremely red for 2 weeks. It has been over 3 weeks now and they are still red and wrinkled. Will never use any of his products again!
customer_reviews.author: BamaGirl

customer_reviews.title: I have not see any difference and im not sure ...

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money

customer_reviews.text: Love how it goes one, but mucho expensive. Too early to tell if my skin improves. Better quality than other antioxidant serums and has real L-acorbic acid not derivative.

customer_reviews.title: I noticed my fine lines under my eyes start to fade around week ...
customer_reviews.text: I noticed my fine lines under my eyes start to fade around week 2! I use this in the morning and before bed. It has improved the overall appearance around my eyes quite a bit! This is a fantastic product and I would highly recommend it. Well worth the money!

customer_reviews.text: Does help, brighten and gets rid of puffy eyes over time. I don't understand why there is a dropper... but using my finger to dab my eyes works just fine. I feel like I'll drop the bottle often because it's so little.

customer_reviews.title: awesome product

customer_reviews.title: Light and effective
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist told me about using Vitamin C on the skin. This product fills the bill. It feels like liquid silk and seems to be effective. I use it underneath other eye products.
customer_reviews.author: NDR

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: While using several eye products at the same time to remove my dark circles,I didn't realize the magnitude and the impact that the Vitamin C eye serum was making on my eyes until the serum was gone. I didn't use the serum for 3 weeks and noticed my dark circles coming back. After returning to the serum, my dark circles are gone again and my eyes do not look tired. They look revitalized again! This product is amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee
